_field_long_integer.name: absolute minimum font size allowed for subtitles
maximum font size allowed for subtitles at the minimum horizontal resolution
absolute maximum font size allowed at max horizontal resolution (or anything bigger than it)

_field_real.name: horizontal padding at minimum horizontal resolution
horizontal padding at max horizontal resolution
vertical padding at minimum horizontal resolution
vertical padding at max horizontal resolution
minimum horizontal resolution for font and padding scaling purposes
maximum horizontal resolution for font and paddingscaling purposes

_field_long_integer.name: step size for the subtitle slider between font sizes

_field_real.name: minimum display time per page of subtitles

_field_char_enum.name: use uniform durations for autopaginated subtitles

_field_real.name: time to fade out completed subtitles
duplicate subtitles requests are allowed only after this many seconds
percent of a subtitle duration required to pass before we allow it to be ejected

_field_short_integer.name: max lines of text per page of subtitles

_field_real.name: subtitle threshold to reset character moniker in seconds

_field_tag_reference_64.name: Unicode tag reference to subtitles character IDs list
